title: Dark Path
description: A drunken boast to a serving girl about a treasure map gets an aging ranger into a bit of trouble. After a conversation with a mismatched pair of "helpful strangers" he takes a shortcut through the woods and encounters more than he had bargained for.  But sometimes things are not what they seem. Find out just who is tricking who and what is what as you follow the exploits of Nix, a dark elf, and Nash, a hulking half orc as they once again attempt to enrich themselves the easy way!  Dark Path is a short story in the sword and sorcery Dark Tales Series.
author: Randall L. Scott
